analyzed: tshhogs ni ji bzhin par/_/tshha rngam chen po'i cha lugs bsgom/_/spyi 'am yang
translated: in general or individually,🔽meditating on the deities of the maṇḍala.

original: na re rer ni/_/tshhom bu gang gi lha rnams bsgom/_/gsang ba'i snying po nyid
analyzed: na re rer ni/_/tshhom bu gang gi lha rnams bsgom/_/gsang ba'i snying po nyid
translated: Having arranged the secret essence,🔽one should be beautified by the consecration

original: bshams te/_/'das pa dag tu mnyam sbyar zhing /_/byin brlabs dbang gis
analyzed: bshams te/_/'das pa dag tu mnyam sbyar zhing /_/byin brlabs dbang gis
translated: of the empowerment of union with the transcendent🔽ones.🔽Having invited with the mantra of the mind,🔽one should offer the torma,

original: mdzes par bya/_/thugs kyi sngags kyis spyan drangs nas/_/dor bskul mchod
analyzed: mdzes par bya/_/thugs kyi sngags kyis spyan drangs nas/_/dor bskul mchod
translated: encourage, make offerings, and praise.🔽Having entered into one’s body,

original: bstod tshhul bzhin bya/_/bdag gi lus la zhugs tshhul du/_/de'i gzugs🔽bzung mchog tu bstim/_/bstan nas gnad la phab byas te/_/dam tshhig
analyzed: bstod tshhul bzhin bya/_/bdag gi lus la zhugs tshhul du/_/de'i gzugs bzung mchog tu bstim/_/bstan nas gnad la phab byas te/_/dam tshhig
translated: one should take on that form and absorb it into the supreme.🔽Having revealed it, one should apply the vital🔽points, show the samaya, and gather the🔽overpowering.

original: bstan zhing zil gnan bsdu/_/phyag 'tshhal dam tshhig mchod pa bya/_/ting
analyzed: bstan zhing zil gnan bsdu/_/phyag 'tshhal dam tshhig mchod pa bya/_/ting
translated: One should prostrate and make offerings to the samaya.

original: 'dzin rdzas rnams mnyes byas te/_/'dod don gsol ba tshhul bzhin bya/_/glu
analyzed: 'dzin rdzas rnams mnyes byas te/_/'dod don gsol ba tshhul bzhin bya/_/glu
translated: one should supplicate for the fulfillment of one’s desires.🔽The six songs and the six melodies

original: drug 'phrin las sngon bzhin du/_/dbyangs drug blangs pas don drug gsal/_/🔽sku gsung thugs kyi bsnyen pa ni/_/rnal 'byor 'phra mo sbyangs pas bya/_/yum
analyzed: drug 'phrin las sngon bzhin du/_/dbyangs drug blangs pas don drug gsal/_/ sku gsung thugs kyi bsnyen pa ni/_/rnal 'byor 'phra mo sbyangs pas bya/_/yum
translated: clarify the six topics.🔽The approach of body, speech, and mind🔽is performed by training in subtle yoga.🔽The siddhis are taken from the space of the mother.

original: gyi mkha' la dngos grub blang /_/phyi nang gsang ba'i 'phro 'du ni/_/rnam
analyzed: gyi mkha' la dngos grub blang /_/phyi nang gsang ba'i 'phro 'du ni/_/rnam
translated: The outer, inner, and secret emanations and reabsorptions

original: gsum tshhul du srog dang ldan/_/'bru brgyad don ni kha las shes/_/bar chad
analyzed: gsum tshhul du srog dang ldan/_/'bru brgyad don ni kha las shes/_/bar chad
translated: all possess the life-force. The meaning of the eight syllables is understood from the mouth.🔽Obstacles are warded off with the supreme samādhi.

original: ting 'dzin mchog gis bzlog_/spyod lam gdan sogs bsrung ba bya/_/gos
analyzed: ting 'dzin mchog gis bzlog_/spyod lam gdan sogs bsrung ba bya/_/gos
translated: One should protect the conduct, seat, and so on.🔽One should engage in the conduct with clothes, ornaments, food, drink, song, and dance

original: rgyan bza' btung glu dang tshhig_/hum du shes pas spyad par bya/_/'jigs byed
analyzed: rgyan bza' btung glu dang tshhig_/hum du shes pas spyad par bya/_/'jigs byed
translated: by knowing them to be hūṃ.🔽One should engage in the conduct with the samādhi of the great Bhairava

original: chen po'i ting 'dzin dang /_/nyams pa med pa'i sems kyis spyad/_/bro gar
analyzed: chen po'i ting 'dzin dang /_/nyams pa med pa'i sems kyis spyad/_/bro gar
translated: and an undiminished mind.🔽At the time of the dance, one should perform the four activities.

original: skabs su bzhi phyir bya/_/bar chad med par sngon bzhin bsgrub/_/zhag grangs
analyzed: skabs su bzhi phyir bya/_/bar chad med par sngon bzhin bsgrub/_/zhag grangs
translated: One should practice without obstacles, as before.

original: tshhang zhing rtags byung na/_/dkyil 'khor 'thun pa nyid du sbyar/_/gzugs sgra
analyzed: tshhang zhing rtags byung na/_/dkyil 'khor 'thun pa nyid du sbyar/_/gzugs sgra
translated: apply the mandala in accordance with the practice.🔽The forms, sounds,🔽smells, lights, and smoke,🔽the smiles, movements,

original: dri 'od du ba dang /_/'dzum g.yo ston dang 'od zer 'phro/_/'phar 'khor
analyzed: dri 'od du ba dang /_/'dzum g.yo ston dang 'od zer 'phro/_/'phar 'khor
translated: and the light rays,🔽the trembling, turning,🔽blazing, and the signs🔽are the natural signs of one's own benefit.

original: 'bar dang mtshhan ma rnams/_/nyam kyi phyag rgya rang don sad/_/phyed pas
analyzed: 'bar dang mtshhan ma rnams/_/nyam kyi phyag rgya rang don sad/_/phyed pas
translated: By distinguishing🔽the reversal and enhancement,

original: bzlog dang spogs par bya/_/in tra sgo ti ku ku ri pa bzhin/_/dngos grub
analyzed: bzlog dang spogs par bya/_/in tra sgo ti ku ku ri pa bzhin/_/dngos grub
translated: like Indrabodhi, Goranta, and Kukuripa,🔽one should take up the supreme siddhi.

original: mchog shes blang bar bya/_/brgyan pa bgegs pa pho nya dang /_/tshhangs pa
analyzed: mchog shes blang bar bya/_/brgyan pa bgegs pa pho nya dang /_/tshhangs pa
translated: The ornaments, obstructors, messengers,🔽and the lords of the directions,

original: dbang po 'dod dbang dang /_mdor na bcu gnyis gling gi bdag_/drag
analyzed: dbang po 'dod dbang dang /_mdor na bcu gnyis gling gi bdag_/drag
translated: in brief, the lords of the twelve continents,🔽the powerful ones with the pride of wrathful strength,

original: shul mthu yi dregs pa can/_/dngas shing brgyal te blo stor nas/_/bum pa
analyzed: shul mthu yi dregs pa can/_/dngas shing brgyal te blo stor nas/_/bum pa
translated: will faint and lose their minds,🔽and offer the excellent vase.🔽The goddesses and ornamented nagas,

original: bzang po 'bul bar 'gyur/_/lha mo klu mo brgyan pa dang /_/rta dang glang po
analyzed: bzang po 'bul bar 'gyur/_/lha mo klu mo brgyan pa dang /_/rta dang glang po
translated: and the horses and elephants

original: sgyu 'phrul tshhogs kyi 'khor lo thugs kyi sgrub pa bzhugs so//
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul tshhogs kyi 'khor lo thugs kyi sgrub pa bzhugs so//
translated: The Wheel of Illusion Assembly: The Mind Sadhana

original: bzhon pa dang /_/gnas dang ster dang bgo ba dang /_/gtshug na nor bu yod
analyzed: bzhon pa dang /_/gnas dang ster dang bgo ba dang /_/gtshug na nor bu yod
translated: The horse, the house, the gift, the clothes, the jewel in the topknot,

original: pa dang /_/ci 'dod yid la bsams pa 'bul/_/de la bran bzhin byed par
analyzed: pa dang /_/ci 'dod yid la bsams pa 'bul/_/de la bran bzhin byed par
translated: and whatever is desired, whatever is thought of, is offered;🔽and one will act like a servant.

original: 'gyur/_/de yi dgos pa thams cad ni/_/ma lus kun rdzogs 'grub par 'gyur//
analyzed: 'gyur/_/de yi dgos pa thams cad ni/_/ma lus kun rdzogs 'grub par 'gyur//
translated: All his needs will be fulfilled completely.

original: de 'dra'i mtshhan ma mthong gyur na/_/rdo rje bla ma'i ngag bzhin bya/_/dngos su
analyzed: de 'dra'i mtshhan ma mthong gyur na/_/rdo rje bla ma'i ngag bzhin bya/_/dngos su
translated: When one sees such signs, one should act in accordance with the words of the vajra guru.🔽One should accept the benefits and ward off the harms

original: phan gnod bzlog blang bya/_/lha dang rdzas dang yo byad lnga'i/_/grub pa tshhul🔽bzhin bsdu bya ste/_/mthing nag 'bar ba'i yig 'bru ni/_/khyung chen ldings
analyzed: phan gnod bzlog blang bya/_/lha dang rdzas dang yo byad lnga'i/_/grub pa tshhul bzhin bsdu bya ste/_/mthing nag 'bar ba'i yig 'bru ni/_/khyung chen ldings
translated: directly. One should gather the accomplishments of the deity, the substances, and the five articles🔽like a bee,🔽and one should possess the samādhi of dissolving the blazing syllables of blue-black🔽like a great garuḍa soaring

original: tsham mtshho ser bzhin/_/bstims sogs ting 'dzin ldan par bya/_/gnyis
analyzed: tsham mtshho ser bzhin/_/bstims sogs ting 'dzin ldan par bya/_/gnyis
translated: in the sky.🔽Dissolve into the state of the nondual dhātu,

original: med dbyings kyi ngang du thib/_/rigs 'dzin dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur/_/
analyzed: med dbyings kyi ngang du thib/_/rigs 'dzin dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur/_/
translated: and one will attain the supreme siddhi of a vidyādhara.

original: dkyil 'khor ma lus 'bar bar 'gyur/_/nyon mongs sdug bsngal sel bar byed//
analyzed: dkyil 'khor ma lus 'bar bar 'gyur/_/nyon mongs sdug bsngal sel bar byed//
translated: The entire maṇḍala blazes and dispels the suffering of affliction.

original: rdo rje rigs su skye ba'i gnas/_/mi gnas nam mkha'i mtha' bslas par/_/
analyzed: rdo rje rigs su skye ba'i gnas/_/mi gnas nam mkha'i mtha' bslas par/_/
translated: the end of space, which is not a place.🔽One who wishes to practice will go there,

original: goms par 'dod pas 'gro ba dang /_/chu la sa bzhin 'gro ba dang /_/bsreg
analyzed: goms par 'dod pas 'gro ba dang /_/chu la sa bzhin 'gro ba dang /_/bsreg
translated: and will go through water as though on land,🔽and will dwell in the middle of a blazing fire,

original: bya 'bar ba'i dbus gnas dang /_/tshha ba rlung gis bteg nas kyang /_/
analyzed: bya 'bar ba'i dbus gnas dang /_/tshha ba rlung gis bteg nas kyang /_/
translated: and will be lifted up by the wind🔽and will go to all the ten directions.

original: phyogs bcu kun tu phyin par 'gyur/_/lus dang phung por bcas pa yisatshhe
analyzed: phyogs bcu kun tu phyin par 'gyur/_/lus dang phung por bcas pa yisatshhe
translated: By means of the body and the aggregates,🔽one will accomplish the state of a master of awareness with power over longevity,

original: la dbang ba'i rigs 'dzin 'grub/_/rig pa 'dzin pa'i tshhe nyid kyis/_/bla
analyzed: la dbang ba'i rigs 'dzin 'grub/_/rig pa 'dzin pa'i tshhe nyid kyis/_/bla
translated: and by means of the state of a master of awareness,

original: med kun tu bzang por 'gyur/_/lus ma spangs par rigs 'dzin sa/_/yun
analyzed: med kun tu bzang por 'gyur/_/lus ma spangs par rigs 'dzin sa/_/yun
translated: one will become the unsurpassed Samantabhadra.

original: rings chos kyi bde spyad nas/_/bla med rdo rje sems dpa'i sa/_/dpe byad
analyzed: rings chos kyi bde spyad nas/_/bla med rdo rje sems dpa'i sa/_/dpe byad
translated: Having enjoyed the bliss of the teachings for a long time🔽in the state of a master of awareness without abandoning the body,🔽one will attain the state of Vajrasattva,🔽adorned with the major and minor marks of excellence,

original: mtshhan gyis rnam par brgyan/_/mngon shes drug ldan thams cad mkhyen/_/
analyzed: mtshhan gyis rnam par brgyan/_/mngon shes drug ldan thams cad mkhyen/_/
translated: omniscient, possessing the six kinds of preternatural knowledge,🔽and perfect in the two great stores of merit and knowledge.

original: tshhogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par ro/_/sangs rgyas zhing la dbang bsgyur zhing //
analyzed: tshhogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par ro/_/sangs rgyas zhing la dbang bsgyur zhing //
translated: One will have power over the buddhafields,

original: spyod yul kun tu ma 'da' la/_/ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/_/rnal
analyzed: spyod yul kun tu ma 'da' la/_/ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/_/rnal
translated: you will accomplish things just as you have visualized them.🔽Even though the yogis who are skilled in action

original: 'byor las su rung rnams kyis/_/'bras bu mngon du ma byung yang /_/lus
analyzed: 'byor las su rung rnams kyis/_/'bras bu mngon du ma byung yang /_/lus
translated: have not actualized the result,🔽they have attained mastery over body,

original: ngag yid la dbang thob nas/_/sangs rgyas 'byung dang bskal mnyam 'gyur/_/
analyzed: ngag yid la dbang thob nas/_/sangs rgyas 'byung dang bskal mnyam 'gyur/_/
translated: speech, and mind, and are equal to the buddhas in eons.🔽Just like the garuda and lion cubs,

original: khyung dang seng phrug ji lta bar/_/rnam smin rigs su the tshhom med/_/kun kyang🔽'gro ba'i don du bsngo/_/sgyu 'phrul tshhogs kyi 'khor lo/_thugs kyi sgrub pa
analyzed: khyung dang seng phrug ji lta bar/_/rnam smin rigs su the tshhom med/_/kun kyang 'gro ba'i don du bsngo/_/sgyu 'phrul tshhogs kyi 'khor lo/_thugs kyi sgrub pa
translated: there is no doubt that they are of the class of the fully matured.🔽All of them are dedicated to the welfare of beings.

original: rdzogs sto//_//
analyzed: rdzogs sto//_//
translated: The mind sadhana of the Wheel of Gathered Great Assembly of the Magical Net is complete.
